text: Hi Everyone!  I've been given a request to add a link to email templates - "Forward To A Friend" link that will forward the email.  Is there a resource with the code that I can add to make this happen?  I know that we now live in a world of more complicated email forwarding.  Thanks for the help!

you cannot create a forward email button some workaround i saw was that make sure you have an online web version of the email the same link that would say “view email in browser” and add that link variable to a mailto: link <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7576844/forward-link-in-html-email>
forwarding marketing emails is bad practice anyway because some email clients add their specific code to the email once you hit the forward button which can lead to rendering issues
Thanks for the help with the view email in browser and helping me give insight to client that forwarding emails is bad practice.
